spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is strongly preserved. Key issues include the omission of several interior doors (Entry to Garage, Master to WIR) and the rotation of the Master Suite bed 90 degrees.

structural_fidelity.notes: Walls are structurally consistent, but internal openings (doorways) are often represented as open gaps rather than swung doors. The garage lacks the internal access door to the entry hall.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is mostly accurate, though the Master bed orientation is incorrect and the pantry/kitchen storage units are simplified.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent isometric execution. Lighting is soft and professional. Geometry is clean with minimal artifacts, though the car model is slightly stylized.

detected_errors.description: Missing internal door between Garage and Entry hall.
Master Suite bed is oriented toward the side wall instead of the bottom wall as shown in the floor plan.
Entry door from Portico is missing its swing/hinge representation, appearing as a permanent void.
The Alfresco area lacks the specific outdoor furniture layout shown in the original 2D plan.
